PHARMS

diphenhydramine

Modern humans must learn how to relate to psychoactives responsibly, treating them with respect and awareness, working to minimize harms and maximize benefits, and integrating use into a healthy, enjoyable, and productive life.

Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk appears within Erowidâ€™s comprehensive resource site on psychoactive substances, specifically in a section that transitions from book and resource listings to details about the legal status of diphenhydramine (Benadryl) under the Pharmaceuticals (PHARMS) category. It marks the start of the diphenhydramine legal overview, following site-support information and preceding an in-depth discussion of U.S. and international law.

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine (Benadryl) Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

Caution : All legal information should be verified through other sources. [see below]

U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY Diphenhydramine REGULATED Yes STATUS Over-The-Counter SCHEDULE Un-Scheduled

Diphenhydramine (Benadryl) is unscheduled in the United States. It is sold over-the-counter as an approved drug and is legal to buy, possess, and ingest without a license or prescription. Sales for human consumption are regulated by the FDA and each formulation or product requires specific FDA approval.

INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Australia #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter in Australia. (unconfirmed) (thanks MP)

Austria #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter in Austria, common brand name Calmaben (50 mg tablets). (thanks FK) (last update Feb 8 2016)

Belgium #


                    Context: 
                    This section provides detailed information on the legal status of diphenhydramine (Benadryl) in the United States and internationally. It summarizes its regulatory classification, over-the-counter availability, scheduling status, and country-specific regulations, as part of Erowid's broader index of drug law information.

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine (Benadryl) Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Austria #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter in Austria, common brand name Calmaben (50 mg tablets). (thanks FK) (last update Feb 8 2016)

Belgium #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter in Belgium, brand name Nustasium, in flat tablets (50 mg each). (unconfirmed) (thanks G) (last updated Aug 24 2010)

Brazil #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk lists the country-specific legal statuses of diphenhydramine, describing its over-the-counter availability and common brand names in Austria, Belgium, and Brazil. It is part of a broader document detailing the legal status of diphenhydramine (Benadryl) in the US and internationally, including variations in regulation, prescription requirements, and restrictions across different countries.

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine (Benadryl) Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Belgium #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter in Belgium, brand name Nustasium, in flat tablets (50 mg each). (unconfirmed) (thanks G) (last updated Aug 24 2010)

Brazil #

Diphenhydramine is reportedly a prescription medicine that one visitor tells us is sold at almost all pharmacies without a prescription needed. Diphenhydramine is not scheduled but is only approved for selling in pharmacies with associations, meds can be OTC or prescription only depending on concentration in a given form. As a pure drug, it is restricted to hospital environment as IV or IM injections. See http://www.anvisa.gov.br/medicamentos/validados/tb_ntvisa.htm. Commonly available, non-prescription products include chewable tablets, pills, and syrups. Most contain acetaminophen, guaifenesin, ammonium chloride, trisodium citrate, etc. (thanks r) (last updated Nov 20, 2012)

Bulgaria #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk is part of a section detailing the international legal status of diphenhydramine (Benadryl), summarizing its availability, regulations, and common brand names in various countries. The excerpt covers the drug's over-the-counter availability in Belgium, specific prescription requirements and product types in Brazil, and transitions to information about Bulgaria.

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine (Benadryl) Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Bulgaria #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter in Bulgaria, brand names include Calmaben (coated tablets, 50mg each) and APAP Night (coated tablets, 500 mg paracetamol and 25mg diphenhydramine). (unconfirmed) (thanks m) (last updated Nov 7 2014)

Canada #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter in Canada. (thanks to AJS)

Germany #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter in Germany. (thanks to BF) (last updated Apr 9 2007)

New Zealand #

Diphenhydramine and dimenhydrinate are controlled under the "Sedating Antihistamines" category and are restricted to pharmacy sales and prescriptions. See www.medsafe.govt.nz/downloads/mcc33SedatingAntihistamines.doc. (thanks R) (last updated Feb 16 2011)

South Africa #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk is part of a section detailing the international legal status of diphenhydramine (Benadryl), listing the availability and regulations for the substance in various countries. It gives country-specific information about whether diphenhydramine is over-the-counter, prescription-only, or controlled, including brand names and relevant legal notes.

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine (Benadryl) Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    South Africa #

Widely available over-the-counter in South Africa, brand name "Betasleep". Each Betasleep capsule contains 50 mg Diphenhydramine. It is a schedule 2 drug according to the South African classification system. The package insert gives no warning of hallucination on overdose. (unconfirmed) (thanks FP) (last updated May 29 2007)

United Kingdom (Britain, U.K., UK) #

Diphenhydramine is widely available over-the-counter, but is not normally sold to people under 16, although is often sold if the purchaser does not look suspicious even if under age. (thanks pf, DP) (last updated Mar 23 2011)

Zambia #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk is part of a section detailing the international legal status of diphenhydramine (Benadryl), listing how the drug is regulated and sold in specific countries such as South Africa, the United Kingdom, and Zambia, following similar summaries for other countries, within a broader overview of diphenhydramineâ€™s legality worldwide.

metadata.title: Erowid Diphenhydramine (Benadryl) Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)

content:
Drug: Diphenhydramine | cid: 3100
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)
Erowid name: diphenhydramine
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    Zambia #

Diphenhydramine is a controlled substance in Zambia and the US State Department warns "The Zambian Drug Enforcement Commission (DEC) has detained a number of U.S. citizens for possession of antihistamines such as Benadryl and other over-the-counter medications, which contained small quantities of diphenhydramine, an active ingredient that is on ZambiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s list of controlled substances. Although unaware of these restrictions, U.S. citizens have been charged with drug-trafficking offenses, had their passports confiscated, and have been jailed. " http://travel.state.gov/travel/cis_pa_tw/cis/cis_1062.html (thanks l) (last updated Oct 23 2013)

Diphenhydramine is sold over-the-counter without prescription in most countries where it is available. Zambia stands out as a country to avoid bringing over the counter medications to.

If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This section details the legal status of diphenhydramine (Benadryl) in Zambia, highlighting it as a controlled substance in contrast to its over-the-counter availability in most other countries. It is part of a broader document that summarizes international and U.S. legal regulations for diphenhydramine, listing specific country-by-country legal information and emphasizing the need for caution and verification due to varying and evolving drug laws.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid legal information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, government documents, websites, and other resources. We are not lawyers and can not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. We do our best to keep this information correct and up-to-date, but laws are complex and constantly changing. Laws may also vary from one jurisdiction to another (county, state, country, etc)...this list is not comprehensive.

RELATED RESOURCES #
